summary: A unit‑test suite that validates the correct parsing and handling of 802.11 (Wi‑Fi) frame header fields, including size, version, type, subtype and various flag bits such as ToDS, FromDS, MoreFrag, Retry, PowerManagement, MoreData and Order.
business_intent: Guarantee that the Wi‑Fi packet processing component conforms to the 802.11 specification and remains reliable across code changes, reducing bugs in network analysis or communication software.
